# thunder_system_link_monitor (Resource)

`thunder_system_link_monitor`: Link Monitoring

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_system_link_monitor" "thunder_system_link_monitor" {
  disable = 0
}
```
